product_name: Club Ride Freedom Bike Shorts - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Save your spandex for the races. Make these your everyday ride wear: the women's Club Ride Freedom Bike Shorts, made of performance fabric that doesn't shout its credentials. Lightweight stretch denim moves easily with you, breathes, wicks moisture and dries fast. Seamless crotch gusset adds comfort. Side zippered pocket. Club Ride Freedom Bike Shorts for women have reflective hits and a 12-in. inseam. Closeout.
short_description: Save your spandex for the races. Make these your everyday ride wear: the women's Club Ride Freedom Bike Shorts, made of performance fabric that doesn't shout its credentials.
